criterion_requirements.name: The applicant must have homogeneous status or be related to the homogeneous person
Nationals of EU Member States and nationals of Member States of the Single European Economic Area (SEEA)

The expatriate or another person entitled to it shall submit in person to the competent Greek Consular Authority of his/her current or last residence in Albania, an application for the issuance of a national entry visa. In the case of minor children, the application shall be submitted by the person having parental responsibility.
